Name: Naturia
About the game: Naturia, a game to discover nature. You will have to survive by managing your hunger, thirst, stamina and your life. Collect a number of plants that can help you. When you have discovered a new plant, you will have access to its file in the encyclopedia with all its real description. All these discovered plants are the illustration of certain plants in our real life and what we could do with them. Also find a certain number of objects, which will be used for the manufacture of utensils or other objects. You will therefore have the possibility of building your shelter or hut to facilitate your survival. Attention, Naturia is in its first phase (Game launched in basic and stable version) many updates free are planned to improve and offer more content. Don't stop at the raw side of the game, also participate in the development thanks to the HUB of the community.
